d.name: Shady Man
d.phase: Good call, it's better to stay away from guys like that.
Hey, hey, hey... you needing notes? Treasury Notes?
d.a: I'd like to convert some gold into notes!
I'd like to convert some gold into notes.
d.phase: Aha! (Yes! A buyer!)... Lucky for you then that I've got some! Look, in perfect condition aren't they, just like the real ones! I'll sell them to you for a good price! Taxes included of course ... I have to feed my seven children, I'm sure you understand man....

No problem, I see you have the King's authority to engage in this kind of transaction. I can only exchange a few notes for you, otherwise people would think me scrupulous... eh, I mean no, then there wouldn't be enough for everyone else.
Sorry my friend, I have to keep these ones for privileged masters.... I mean, ..., I'm in demand around here I'll have you know!
